long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doomscrolling the news won't help beat Trump. Instead, do something about it. Download this extension to automatically redirect from news sites to a useful page about how to effectively stop Trump. You can block and redirect from a default list of news sites and/or manually add and remove sites of your choosing.
